title: facings
author: facings
content: Selling Oculus Rift s in slightly used, like new condition. Absolutely Oculus here in the past you can check my post history.  Please offer below/in dm

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: facings on July 16, 2022, 12:05:20 AMSelling Oculus Rift s in slightly used, like new condition. Absolutely Oculus here in the past you can check my post history.Just did [link] and based on the nitehawk's feedback in your profile, it appears that you already sold it on another platform! Do you have anything to say or rather show [here's how to do it properly] in your defense?

comments.author: facings
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on July 19, 2022, 08:15:55 PMQuote from: facings on July 16, 2022, 12:05:20 AMSelling Oculus Rift s in slightly used, like new condition. Absolutely Oculus here in the past you can check my post history.Just did [link] and based on the nitehawk's feedback in your profile, it appears that you already sold it on another platform! Do you have anything to say or rather show [here's how to do it properly] in your defense?. That was an Oculus Rift DK1 and I'm willing to use any trusted escrow.  This is an Oculus Rift S.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: facings on July 20, 2022, 12:18:32 PMThat was an Oculus Rift DK1 and I'm willing to use any trusted escrow.  This is an Oculus Rift S. So am I correct in assuming that you're not going to post a picture of the device in question with your name and the date on a piece of paper [again]? If "yes", then the only way for such deals to be acceptable for a potential buyer is to be the one who'd cover the cost for an "escrow provider"!- Nothing stops you from repeating what you already did in the past (wasting someone else's time and money [fee for the escrow provider])!
